1082.question: What systems are tested?

4-Table2-1.png: The VoxCeleb-based systems are tested, including VoxCeleb x-vector PLDA, +PLDA adaptation (X11), and +Extractor fine-tuning (X21).
4-Table1-1.png: The systems tested are BULATS-trained baseline systems on BULATS and Linguaskill test sets.

1082.answer:
BULATS i-vector/PLDA
BULATS x-vector/PLDA
VoxCeleb x-vector/PLDA
PLDA adaptation (X1)
 Extractor fine-tuning (X2)
